::Halucigen::
Halucigen saw the claws reaching at him and closed his wings going
into a fat spin straight down nearly dodging the talons of Prowl.  He
fired two Explosive rockets at the monter and a four feather missiles
homing them on the head of the beast....

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Is his calming thing still going?
>
> ::Prowl::
>
> Prowl dove down after Halucigen, his teeth ripping the severed leg in
> two with a grinding motion, one half falling toward the ground while
> the other half is swallowed. Prowl's talons attempt to grap Halucigen
> as Prowl dives after him.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Halucigen::
> > Halucigen's eyes widened as the monster kept flying at him.
> > "AHHHHHHHHH" he let out a scream like a coward and turned to fly
> away
> > but Prowl's gian mouth got his leg. He turned and with his quick
> > calculations figured the only thing to do was to shoot his leg off.
> > His scorpion tail whipped up fireing an Corrosive Rocket at his leg
> > and mouth of hte beast. It hit his leg and the metal was burned away
> > by the dangerous acid
> > "AHHHHHRRRGGHH!" he screamed again. With his leg off he fell towards
> > the ground but his wings reacted and he tried to fly away.
> > "I uncovered something....that beats my worse nightmare by far..."
> he
> > croaked to himself....
